name: Mask Off: A DIY Face Mask Making Workshop
description:
Join us for an exclusive hands-on skincare experience! Hosted in collaboration with JheyNBeau, this unique event will allow you to create your very own natural face mask using only the finest ingredients, in celebration of Earth Day.

There are limited spots available, so be sure to grab your tickets early!

What to Expect:
- 30-minute Introduction & Skin Type Education
- 45-minute DIY Face Mask Creation
- 15-minute Q&A
